title: Create casual and simple mobile Unity 3D car game
desc: Greetings! We are looking for a TEAM who can develop a casual mobile video game utilizing Unity 3D in just 14 days (2 weeks), with several features. Which include:- Microtransaction- Tutorial- Leaderboards and achievements- Daily Rewards- Ability for user to share on social media and throw a photo with their camera- About- Rate us- OptionsThe game will have you handling a car in birds eye view, dodging obstacles, and collecting items in order to save people.The team is required to create the characters, animations, add sound, programming and user interface. You must have an android and iOS laptop for exporting since it will be for both platforms. The team will also be in charge of publishing the game on the android and iOS store, in addition to the game development.3 milestones will be created, first phase, middle phase and publishing.  We have a perfect freelancer rating, trust us and this will be a longterm partnership. Upon selected for the project a full documentation will be provided. If the deadline is too difficult we can discuss how to make the game simpler in order to launch quicker.If selected in phase 2 the development will continue with multiplayer mode and other features that make this a longterm project.

title: Build game android and ios
desc: We need an application game developed for android and ios.	here some characteristics:.	.	The background: have to be composed of 20 figures ( girl or animals or kids… or somethings) holding in their hands our tubes of different colors. Inside of each tube will be a paper-parchment that has on it an object, for example a peace of pizza or a bottle of wine, fruits and so on. Every one of this objects will have points that will be gained by the player while he is opening this tubes one by one. One particular tube will have a bomb in it, when the player will choose the tube with the bomb the game will be over and all the points till that moment will be calculated and will be their final score..	( need to be created also all the graphics and some nice animations when a player open the tube).	the rules are the same, rooms are composed  from 20 players and who will get more point will go to the next round..	rounds are :  eighth final, quarter finals,semifinal and.	final. every round have to be composed from 20 player. (in conclusion, will partecipate to the 4 round (final) 20 players that won in a row 1, 2 and 3 round...	like you can see, the players, even if will be located in the same room, can play in different time so is important to send some notification when all 20 players completed the round for to check the ranking and see who is the winner...	the game have to be developed for android and iOS and have connected a bitcoin  wallet becouse the game is a pay to play.after downloaded the app , for to play, need to make a registration and phone number confirmation (whatsapp style) and security password.

desc: I would like to have a basic e-wallet application for mobile built. Simple, easy to use, not too complicated. Broadly speaking the app should be secure, meaning that even if a user were to lose his/her phone the money stored on the app would be safe. As opposed to conventional apps where the application holds the user's card details and so on, this app only needs to be able to hold currency units determined by the currency it is funded in. Extremely basic, extremely simple. Added to this I would like to have an instant messaging functionality integrated into said e-wallet.

title: Project for Wu L.
desc: Hi Wu L.Needed your expertise in a project we want to start.We have a set of data (GPS coordinates) of with tags on them. Some of these tags are already customers of ours.We want to identify which ones of the tags are our customers and which are potential customers by plotting them in a map.We also have a set of data (GPS coordinates) of potential retailers who are selling our product in the market, we need to be able to identify them as well (In different colors)So what we need is a tool, that will enable us to1) Dump all tags available (Can be edited from time to time)2) Dump tags that represents our current customers3) Allow us to dump tags of retailers selling our products.At the end we want to have an overall look in one map to show us, whats available in the market, vs what is our share, vs how many channels available that sells our product. We want to have control over it as well.At the same time, we want to have a link form to give to our door to door agents, so that when they visit a customer we could identify where did they visit.Regards,Issam

title: Fix issues with app and upgrade (Android)
desc: 1) I have an app that is in advance stage of development. The app takes a photo and gather environmental data and upload images and environment data at predefined time intervals. It uploads image and text file to a website as JPG and TXT file via FTP while the phone connected to the net either on wifi or cellular network. There are still some issues with the app that needs to be fixed plus improve the UI of the app. Once issues were fixed I would like to upload the app to google play.2) After that, remove FTP protocol (one screen) and replaced by a screen that will allow users to login or sign up when they open the app (login in the website). Then the image will be uploaded via HTTP protocol to a user dir which will be defined in the app and will be created on the website. The rest of the app will remain the same as the FTP version. Then upload the HTTP version of the app to google play.

title: Ionic Mobile app
desc: I am looking for someone to build an Ionic V3 app that will be for android and ios.The app will need to have a profile section where a user could provide details that will be disclosed later, the user will also be able to check and uncheck categories for the google places API map.The profile will be where the logout button and functionality will be located.The map will display nearby places according to the profile categories selected.The map will update the places list when the user zooms or moves the map.The map will auto locate the user on-load.The map will display a swipe-able area (below or overlay) in which the image, name, description, and rating will be displayed along with a button for navigation and adding to favorites.Clicking on the shop image or navigation button will trigger an in-app navigation process for walking.Clicking on the favorite button will add to the favorite and fill the icon to an active state.The entire app will be connected to Firebase and would use authentication for logging in or out.The app will allow social logins.The app will have a left menu with a profile section including an Avatar, a link to favorites, map, profile.The app will have a welcome screen which will hold content that will be provided later.I will be able to also assist with development as I am fully capable with the technologies I requested but do not have enough time to build this entirely by myself.Designs will be provided when needed and UI will also be able to get worked on the fly.Please provide a few links to example apps that are similar in behavior.Additional details and requests will be provided when required.

title: Hire a Mobile App Developer
desc: Laundry Delivery Service Application:Customer would be able to schedule their pre-request with their price and type of laundry.it will be notified to admin, so admin will dispatcher driver(s) to take order from customer & Scan receipt of laundry using bar code or QR scanWhen dropped off at cleaning facility, Admin or staff will scan receipt of laundry, and update the process of laundry, the customer will get notified from the appOnce it is done, driver will scan bag and deliver it to customer, driver can track customer address or location and also customer will be able to see driver location when their laundry is on delivery statusOnce customer is get it then driver will update the status to completed and customer will get an email or text asking if everything went as planned, and leave an updateAdmin will be able to see all orders and check payment history through application, and customer will be only able to see their purchase history in his/her appAdmin will be able to create reports on sales, service areas, best clients, etc.Admin will be able to edit product types, prices, quantity, and descriptionAdmin will be able to add photos to product descriptionAdmin will be able to set promotions on specific product typesAdmin will be able to edit terms of service, offers, FAQ, etc

title: Event scheduling iPhone/Androd app
desc: This is supposed to be a media app for the purpose of scheduling and organizing events. The app is going to be used to create an event, invite people to an event and share group messages. It uses phone contacts to achieve this. This interface will be extended to more specialized events later on.There is going to be a messenger embedded in the app, so if you have a readymade messenger template and UI/objects, that can speed up the process. The messenger and the app, in general, require the use of hardware features such as camera and GPS, similar to Facebook. If you have a Fb or WhatsApp messenger app template ready, that will also excellent. The app should also be able to send invitation SMS messages when not in internet connection, directly and globally.The app is expected to be deployed on the cloud. Familiarity with AWS/Heroku/Firebase or any other cloud server is necessary.Icon design and UI aesthetics also need to be worked out. Use of Adobe draw and knowledge of app aesthetics and UI flow would also come later on.Using good design patterns such as Immutable views pattern that reduces dependencies and facilitates better asynchronization is encouraged.Delevarables:-1) Android app(kotlin or Java)- Source code- Documentation2) IOS app (Swift)- Source code- Documentation3)Interface with AWS/Heroku- Source code- Documentation4) An App introduction website containing links to app.
